mapper.select: select * from t_ship_shipment where SHIPMENT_ID=#{shipmentId} and ALIVE_FLAG='1'
select * from t_ship_shipment where UUID=#{uuid} and ALIVE_FLAG='1'
mapper.update:
update t_ship_shipment
ALIVE_FLAG='0' ,UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE()
where (AGREEMENT_UUID , LOAD_PORT_CODE ,OIL_TYPE_CODE) NOT IN
(#{item.agreementUuid},#{item.loadPort},#{item.oilType})
AND SHIP_PACT_UUID=#{shipPactUuid}
